ContributionCreated(uint256,uint256[],st.details: this is Contribution Create event this event will be emitted when a new contribution is created.

params.contributionId: it is the unique identifier for the contribution
params.createdAt: createdAt is indicates the time of creation of the contribution
params.description: the description of record that is in text format
params.previewFile: this is the file that contains the mix of the contribution also known as preview file
params.previewFileHash: this is the hash of the preview file to make sure the previewFile is not tampered with
params.recordId: this is the id of the record to which the contribution belong to
params.roughMix: this flag determines if the contribution is a new contribution, with new tracks or is it just mix of all the previous tracks
params.seedContribution: this flag determines if the contribution is a seed contribution or not
params.status: this is status of the contribution that is (PENDING = 1 | ACCEPTED = 2| REJECTED = 3)
params.title: title of the contribution
params.tracks: are id of the tracks that are part of this contribution, you will have to manually fetch the tracks data from trackId once you do the indexing.

controllerCreateNewContribution((uint256.details: This function will be called by the controller contract to create a new contribution and voting

params.owner: this is the owner of the new contribution which is to be created
params.payload: this is the data required for creation of new contribution

controllerCreateSeedContribution((uint25.details: This function is to be called only by the controller contract that is created to bundle multiple contract calls into single function

params.owner: address of the owner of the seed contribution
params.payload: data for the seed contribution creation

createNewContribution((uint256[],string,.details: This function will be called by the user to create a new contribution

params.payload: this is the data required for creation of new contribution
params.platformFee: this is the incentive amount for the UI maintainer
params.platformWallet: this is the UI providers wallet

createSeedContribution((uint256[],string.details: This function will be called by the user to create a new seed contribution as there will be not voting or anything like that

params.payload: data for the seed contribution creation
params.platformFee: this is the incentive amount for the UI maintainer
params.platformWallet: this is the UI providers wallet

params.contributionId: Id of the contribution whose data you want

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: This is to set the address of the contracts

params.controllerContractAddress: this is the address of controller contract
params.newRecordsContractAddress: this is the address of new Records contract
params.newTracksContractAddress: this is the address of new tracks contract
params.newVotingContractAddress: this is the address of new voting contract

setOwnerAddress(address).details: This function sets the owner address

params.ownerAddress: This is the address of the owner
